channel.title: OpenMetaAnalysis Home on OpenMetaAnalysis
channel.description: Recent content in OpenMetaAnalysis Home on OpenMetaAnalysis

item.title: Create a Review
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Robert Badgett, MD)
item.description: Combining the concepts of scoping reviews (PMID 20854677,25034198) with Agile programming, you can have preliminary forest plots on your public website quickly to help yourself and collaborators design your formal lit search and analyses. By taking advantage of existing systematic reviews and cited reference searching, your lit search is quicker than in other methods of executing meta-analyses.

item.title: Update a Review
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Robert Badgett, MD)
item.description: If you would like to modify or make a alternative version of an existing review, feel free to contact rbadgett@kumc.edu
